title: Implement AllowedClaimsRegistry Stub
description: Implement the AllowedClaimsRegistry as a stub service that can match claims in transcript or response metadata against an approved claims list. Integrate with Lane C ClaimsChecker and ensure it emits the correct policy decision events.
acceptance_criteria: AllowedClaimsRegistry can load and match claims from allowed_claims.json
ClaimsChecker uses AllowedClaimsRegistry to check claims in input
Policy decision events include reason_codes when claims are disallowed
Stub supports future hardening for production
